TypeSignature.Value: .class nested protected auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlSerializationReader/CollectionFixup extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Holds an delegate instance, plus the method's inputs; also supplies the method's parameters.

remarks.format:
## Remarks During initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for deserialization derived from the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader> class. During this process, the infrastructure generates methods that implement the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback> delegate. Additionally, it instantiates <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.CollectionFixup> class objects to store the fix-up methods along with their inputs. The infrastructure does so for SOAP-encoded arrays or SOAP-encoded, multireferenced elements whose data types, in either case, map to .NET Framework collections or enumerations. Then, as necessary, the methods are invoked during deserialization to fill in array items or multireferenced objects.
Do not directly instantiate <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback> or <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.CollectionFixup>.
SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.

MemberSignature.Value: public CollectionFixup (object collection, System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback callback, object collectionItems);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(object collection, class System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback callback, object collectionItems) cil managed

Docs.param: A collection into which the callback method copies the collection items array.
A method that instantiates the delegate.
An array into which the callback method copies a collection.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with parameters for a callback method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Do not directly create and instance of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.CollectionFixup> class or the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback> delegate.

Docs.summary: Gets the callback method that instantiates the delegate.
Docs.value: The delegate that points to the callback method.

Docs.summary: Gets the for the callback method.
Docs.value: The collection that is used for the fixup.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.CollectionFixup.Collection%2A> property gets the collection into which the method that implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback> delegate copies the array that is obtained through the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.CollectionFixup.CollectionItems%2A> property.

Docs.summary: Gets the array into which the callback method copies a collection.
Docs.value: The array into which the callback method copies a collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.CollectionFixup.CollectionItems%2A> property gets the array that the method that implements the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationCollectionFixupCallback> delegate copies into the collection object that is obtained through the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializationReader.CollectionFixup.Collection%2A> property.
